message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a fully data-driven approach using feedforward neural networks for single document summarization. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Natural Language Processing (NLP) sub-category of Computer Science (cs.CL). Additionally, the use of neural networks indicates that the paper may also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The paper also deals with information retrieval and document processing, which suggests that it may belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. Finally, the use of recursive feeding of fixed-sized parts of the document to the network suggests that the paper may also belong to the Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) sub-category.
